creator: covener@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text: sorry, missed it in the configure line.
did this use a bundled apr-util?  do you have config.log from the configure of the bundled apr-util?
creator: covener@gmail.com
alcol@hotmail.com
text:
I tried to compile 2.3.8 and I needed to upgrade APR

as it does not compile, I tried to compile 2.2.17 as I was with 2.2.15

I failed to build 2.2.17 then I tried to compile again (as test) 2.2.15
